class.name: xbkFileExplorer
class.desc: The xbkFileExplorer class provide a file explorer.

param.name: inst
param.comment: The name or id to be use for this xbkFileExplorer.

param.name: parent
param.comment: The parent of the xbkFileExplorer object if it has one.

method.name: getParentNode
method.method_desc: Creates a parent xbkTreeNode Folder and return it.

param.name: text
param.comment: Text that appears for the item.

param.name: fHandler
param.comment: Reference to a handler function for this xbkTreeNode.

param.name: closeImg
param.comment: Image to use for folder close.

param.name: openImg
param.comment: Image to use for folder open.

return.comment: Reference to a xbkTreeNode note: see xbkTreeNode class

method.name: getChildNode
method.method_desc: Creates a child xbkTreeNode and return it.

param.name: text
param.comment: Text that appears for the item.

param.name: fHandler
param.comment: Reference to a handler function for this xbkTreeNode.

return.comment: Reference to a xbkTreeNode note: see xbkTreeNode class
